abstract: Stan Fischler, known as Hockey Maven to his MSG Networks audience, loves his hockey memorabilia-stuffed two-bedroom rental apartment on West 109th Street for its proximity to the No 1 subway line.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Fischler, the resident hockey expert on the MSG Networks, lives in a two-bedroom rental on the Upper West Side.

headline.main: Stan Fischler, Hockey Maven, at Home
headline.print_headline: The Maven, and Not Just of Hockey

snippet: Mr. Fischler, the resident hockey expert on the MSG Networks, lives in a two-bedroom rental on the Upper West Side.
